title: High Spend, Low ROAS Keyword
description: ₹4,850 spend with ROAS 0.7 indicating inefficient spend.
analysis: The keyword 'Dettol Liquid Handwash 200ml' has a spend of ₹4,850 but only 0.7 ROAS, underperforming the 2.5x benchmark.
recommendation: Reduce bids by 25% and reallocate 50% of the budget to high-performing hygiene SKUs.
actionable_items: Reduce CPC bid by 25%; Pause broad match variants; Shift ₹2,500 to Lifebuoy Handwash category

title: Budget Underspend in Festive Category
description: Campaign utilized only 65% of its allocated budget in the last 7 days.
analysis: The 'Festive_Beauty_Sale_2025' campaign underspent its allocated ₹70,000 budget, missing out on potential impression share.
recommendation: Increase daily cap by 20% to utilize full budget potential during peak festive days.
actionable_items: Raise daily cap to ₹12,000; Monitor spend pacing daily; Enable automatic bid adjustment for top SKUs

title: High Conversion Keyword - Scaling Opportunity
description: Conversion rate 3.5x above campaign average, opportunity to scale.
analysis: Keyword 'Colgate Strong Teeth 200g' is showing a conversion rate 3.5x higher than the average, suggesting scalability.
recommendation: Increase bid by 15% and expand targeting to Tier-1 cities.
actionable_items: Raise keyword bid by 15%; Add Tier-1 city targeting; Monitor incremental CVR weekly

title: Ad Fatigue in Creative Set B
description: CTR dropped 35% over 5 days; frequency reached 6.1 per user.
analysis: Creative Set B has been overexposed, causing ad fatigue and CTR decline.
recommendation: Rotate creative assets; introduce new visuals with influencer-led creatives.
actionable_items: Swap Creative B with new design; Limit frequency cap to 4 per user; A/B test new influencer creative

title: High-Performing Retargeting Segment
description: ROAS 7.2x and CVR 4.6% in retargeting segment.
analysis: Retargeting set for 'Philips Trimmer QP2525' achieved ROAS 7.2x, 3x higher than prospecting.
actionable_items: Boost retargeting budget by 30%; Reduce prospecting by 15%; Add high LTV audience in segment
